label: ProcessCertificate
comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.
A code specifying an applicable object, such as item, animal, person or organization, for this agricultural certificate.
A code specifying a type of specified certificate.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
An expiry date, time, date time or other date time value for this specified licence.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
The code specifying the reason for the issue of this process certificate.
An identifier of a party issuing this sustainability assertion.
A code specifying a purpose for this field crop.
The requested effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.

objectProperties.comment: A sustainability assertion applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A process certification applicable to this process certificate.
A process characteristic applicable to this process certificate.
A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A binary file attached for this sustainability inspection.

referencedBy.comment: A process certificate obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
A process certificate for this specified chemical treatment.
A process certificate applicable to this specified crop protection treatment.
